name: Harvest Rush -Card Racing Game
description:
This game is great and fun from kids all the way up to grandparents! A twist on the classic Card Driving game.

The object of this exciting card game is to get 1000 bushels. In order for you to get 1000 bushels, you must have played a Sunshine card. But watch out, other players can play hazards to stop your cutting, such as broken belts, bearings, flat tires, low fuel, and even rain! See if you can overcome these hazards to win Harvest Rush!

Very fun and addicting card game for all ages!

Game details:
-Choose from 3 difficulty settings!
-Easy gameplay
-3 adjustable leveled computer players
-Enable/Disable music!
-Auto saves your games on close so you can resume play whenever and wherever!
